cyclone.name: DELTA
cyclone.current_location: about 425 miles south of Cameron, Louisiana
cyclone.trajectory: tracking northwest across the central Gulf today, then turning north-northeast toward the southwest-central Louisiana coast

weather_observation.watch_coast: Storm Surge Watch from High Island, TX to Sabine Pass
weather_observation.warning_coast: Tropical Storm Warning San Luis Pass, TX to Sabine Pass; Hurricane Warning east of Sabine Pass to Morgan City, LA; Storm Surge Warning Sabine Pass, TX to Ocean Springs, MS
weather_observation.impacted_coast: Northern Gulf Coast from High Island, TX eastward across all of Louisiana to coastal Mississippi
weather_observation.wind: Only a low (≤7%) chance of sustained tropical-storm-force winds; occasional gusts 20–30 mph possible Thursday night into early Friday.
weather_observation.storm_surge: No significant surge expected; water level changes likely <1 ft along the port’s immediate shoreline.
weather_observation.rainfall: Main rain shield remains east; stray outer bands could bring 1–2 inches of rain at most.
weather_observation.other_hazards: Dangerous rip currents and higher surf along nearby Gulf beaches.
